Module org.easymock
Package org.easymock

Class Capture<T>

java.lang.Object
org.easymock.Capture<T>
Type Parameters:
T - Type of the captured element
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Capture<T> extends Object implements Serializable
Will contain what was captured by the capture() matcher. Knows if something was captured or not (allows to capture a null value).
Author:
Henri Tremblay
See Also:

    • getValue

      public T getValue()
      Return captured value.
      Returns:
      The last captured value
      Throws:
      AssertionError - if nothing was captured yet or if more than one value was captured

    • getValues

      public List<T> getValues()
      Return all captured values. It returns the actual list so you can modify it's content if needed.
      Returns:
      The currently captured values
